caption.title: K1/2 values (mM) for GDP and GTP.
caption.p: Enzyme kinetics data were fitted by non-linear regression to the Michaelis-Menten equation to derive Vmax and KM values. The Vmax values versus GTP/GDP concentration were then adjusted to a sigmoidal dose-response function using the GraphPad software package.

fn.p: K1/2 values are given in mM units (Mean ± SD), and are representative of two independent experiments.
